Title: :"Oracle BI 11g Map Viewer:Clicking logout reloads the page itself but doesn't logout the user"
Description: : :"1)Open Oracle BI 11g Map Viewer page 2)Click logout link at the top right corner of the page" :"Map Viewer page gets reloaded, but user stays logged in" :"Medium" :"User should be logged out and page gets reloaded" :"Reproduced in all browsers"
